questions.question: What multi-tenant data isolation model is required?
questions.why: Shared database, schema-per-tenant, or database-per-tenant have vastly different cost and security tradeoffs

questions.question: What subscription billing model will be used?
questions.why: Flat-rate vs usage-based vs tiered affects billing system complexity significantly

questions.question: Is white-labeling or custom branding required?
questions.why: Affects theming system, custom domains, and email configuration

questions.question: What usage metering and limits are needed?
questions.why: API rate limiting, storage quotas, and feature gates require consistent enforcement

questions.question: What customer data export and deletion capabilities are required?
questions.why: GDPR right to data portability and right to deletion; also needed for offboarding

questions.question: What SSO/enterprise authentication options are needed?
questions.why: Enterprise customers often require SAML, OIDC, or directory sync (SCIM)

questions.question: Is SOC 2 certification required?
questions.why: Enterprise sales often require SOC 2 Type II; affects logging, access controls, and processes

questions.question: What self-service vs sales-assisted onboarding is needed?
questions.why: Affects trial flow, demo environment, and admin tooling requirements

questions.question: What third-party integrations are essential at launch?
questions.why: Slack, Salesforce, etc. integrations affect API design and webhook architecture

questions.question: What tenant-level analytics and admin dashboards are needed?
questions.why: Customer success requires visibility into tenant usage and health
